TopicTitle: Small nerva styled nuclear rocket engines.

Articles.Content:
I remember about one year ago I had this mod installed that contained small nuclear rocket engines.

Engines in all kinds of different sizes like that of the stock Rockomax 48-7S and I think even as small as the rockomax 24-77 engines.

I can't remember the name of the mod, or whether this mod actually operates under version 0.90 of KSP.

I really want this mod for a fleet of small interplanetary spaceplanes. But I cannot find it anywhere. If you by any change know that exact mod or any alternative mod that supplies these nuclear engines I'd be happy to hear about it.
Kommitz' FTmN pack had one, although you might have to update the old pack to get the 0.625 engine. RLA Stockalike and Lack's SXT also have new engines, IIRC.
